Content.Text:
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Go ahead and
relax, <MYNAME>. This town is very
easygoing.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good morning. I think I'll take a
break.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You should stay
at the inn too. Niko's cooking is out of
this world.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Now what'll we have for
lunch? I'm hungry.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. Things at the inn are
fine, all because of you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. It's gotten quite dark. Be
careful on your way home, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. <MYNAME>, you like to keep
busy, don't you? Working until this
this hour...

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. This town is pitch black
at night. Other towns have street lights
and it's like daytime.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Ahh, it's great when it's
nice and sunny. Makes me sleepy.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, looks like rain. Days like this are
perfect for mulling over new ideas for
a novel.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This heat is unbearable when you're fat.
With every move, you're drenched in
sweat. Ack.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Don't you think rain
suits this town? Or am I the only one
who thinks that?

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, isn't this weather amazing? This
calls for a haiku poem. Autumn skies...
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Cripes, I can't think of anything. Maybe
I'm just not talented.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>. When it rains, guests don't
come to the inn. Why, I've already had a
few cancellations today...

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. Today's cold? You think so?
I think it's just right.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>... When it snows, guests
don't come to the inn. I hate snow.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The wind is blowing so hard. <MYNAME>, I
think you should head home quickly.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The wind is blowing so hard. <MYNAME>, I
think you should head home quickly.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I hear you got yourself a
sweetheart. That's great news.
<PAGE>
I want your love to be so special that
it would make a great novel. I'm rooting
for you.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was away, I missed this forest
scenery so much. This place is special,
after all.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Produce from here is used in the foods
we serve at the inn. All the produce
grown here is delicious.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... What shall I use in today's menu?
Maybe I'll catch some fish from the
river and grill it.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
There used to be more kids in town and
they loved to play in the river. It's
lonely now that there are few kids.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Haa...haaa...Boy, I'm tired. The air
here must be very thin. I'm so tired.
<PAGE>
Huh? Not enough exercise? Well, you
could be right. Maybe I should diet.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, you're full of energy. You're
hardly panting even after coming this
far. Are you farmers that fit?

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your farm is fantastic, <MYNAME>. You're
sure to have lots of produce here. Will
you let me have some for the inn too?

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They occasionally took care of the farm
before you came, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Looking back, I'm sure it was so that
the farm could be passed on to you.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm here in the mine, I feel like
writing a mystery. My imaginations runs
wild.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How is the mining going, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Mining is one thing that depends on
sheer luck, so don't get depressed if
you don't have much success.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's been slow at the inn, so I've just
been working on my novel.
<PAGE>
More guests had better start coming if
I'm to run a business. But well, we'll
manage somehow.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think there are more people lately.
The town has livened up and it's good.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has really livened up.
<PAGE>
Business has been so good lately that
I haven't been able to work on my
novel.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I never expected this town to prosper
this much.
<PAGE>
Everyone really worked hard. I'm just
so grateful.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, <MYNAME>, thanks to you, I was able
to return to this town. Thank you very
much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I'm sorry I acted disgracefully the
first time we met. I was just about
to leave town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You built such a grand inn, I'm going
to give it my all. You are welcome
anytime, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm working on a novel now. I'm still
not good at it though. I'm just
gathering ideas right now.
<PAGE>
It's my hope that I can make a living
writing novels one day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Anyway, that's my dream. I figure, I've
got nothing to lose.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Honestly, running the inn and writing a
novel is exhausting. 
<PAGE>
But I just think of my family and I'm
able to find the strength to keep going.
<PAGE>
Besides, Niko cooks and is a great help.
So somehow, I'm managing to do both.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My wife? Oh, she's taking a trip now.
<PAGE>
My wife wanted to see the world and
she's on a world tour.
<PAGE>
She sends something good from each place
every month for Niko and me. Isn't she
a good wife?
<PAGE>
She said she's coming home after she
sees every country. I wonder where she
is right now.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone tells me I'm such an optimist.
Do you think so?
<PAGE>
But really, what's the point in fretting
when something goes wrong?
<PAGE>
I say don't waste time worrying.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I tried running an inn after I left the
town. But I learned that I belong here,
after all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Things were so hectic in other places,
so stifling. I'm glad I was able to come
back here.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Our families owe you so much,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You provided complete strangers like us
with a store.
<PAGE>
Please come to me, <MYNAME>, if you
ever need anything. I'll be so glad
to help.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okonomiyaki! It looks delicious. I love
okonomiyaki. What? I can have some?
<PAGE>
Wow, thank you. Munch, munch. Delish!
You're a great cook.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, <MYNAME>, what a treat. I love this,
y'know.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you are a saint. Thank you very
much.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Can I have this? Gee, thanks. You're
terrific, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. You've given me a fine thing.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't mind getting presents, but can
you be more selective?

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What were you thinking? I can't accept
such a thing.
<PAGE>
Why? Because you gave me something I
detest.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't want tomato soup! It's the thing
I hate most. How rude of you!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, adults don't go around
provoking people. It makes people mad.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You grew this and I can have it? Wow,
this is huge. We'll use it for our
meals at the inn.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You grew this huge things?! And I can
have it? Well, thank you.
<PAGE>
We'll cook it at the inn. I wonder how
many people it'll feed.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't need any today. I appreciate
your thoughtfulness though.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for always thinking of me.
But I don't need any today.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're giving me a birthday present?
Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
On top of which, it's my favorite
okonomiyaki! Munch, munch... Yum!
<PAGE>
You're just as good as Niko at cooking.
How about being a cook at the inn? Let
me know if you're ever interested.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday  present for me? Wow, thank
you very much.
<PAGE>
I don't deserve such a fine gift. I'm
glad I met you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? Thank you.
<PAGE>
Oh, this is just what I wanted. I'm
really happy with it.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present for me? Thank you.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I guess this'll pass as a birthday
present.
<PAGE>
It's too much to expect something that
I really wanted.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Whatever gave you the idea to give this
as a birthday present?
<PAGE>
You have bad taste, <MYNAME>. This is
the worst present anyone could give me.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
A birthday present? Tomato soup?
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Is this some kind of joke?! Are you
crazy giving me what I hate most?!

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a birthday present? Wow, it's so
huge.
<PAGE>
I'll eat it later. Thank you.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whoa! It's huge! This is my birthday
present? Wow!
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Isn't this way too huge? Don't get me
wrong, I'm happy to get a present.
<PAGE>
I'll eat it leisurely. I wonder how
long it'll take.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had one as a pet long ago. They're
cute, but they grow so fast.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The chicken I had long ago laid lots of
eggs. So every day we had an egg dish.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The one I had long ago didn't grow as
large as this. Maybe I didn't give it
enough TLC.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love it when they stick their tongue
out. I can watch them for hours.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, its body is shaped just like mine. 
Hmm...what a cute thing.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This dog looks a bit like you, <MYNAME>.
I guess pets look like their owners,
after all.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Its belly looks just like mine. I'm  
starting to feel a connection with it.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a tame cat. It doesn't try to run
away even when I hold it.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I didn't know cats could get this fat.
I'm a little shocked.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, such soft fur. It feels so good.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A chubby cat is quite unusual, you know.
Maybe you're spoiling it too much.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you still celebrate the
Flower Festival? Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can have candy? Haha, leftovers from
the Pumpkin Festival, right? Hahaha, I'd
love to have some.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, a blue shuttlecock. I also proposed
right here in this very town. Boy, how
embarrassing.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a ring? I gave one to my wife many
years ago. She was so happy.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When there's leftover food, I try to
feed them. But I've never seen one like
this...

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a cute animal. Won't the guests at
the inn be surprised if I had one like
this for a pet?

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I don't know if you'll like it, but I
got you a birthday present. Here you go.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I heard, <MYNAME>. It's your birthday,
eh? Congratulations.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's been quite a while, <MYNAME>. I was
worried since I haven't seen you.

Thank y...Goin' home alrea...pretty...
Soon...zzz...zzz...zzz...see you.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Munch, munch...This is really tasty.
...munch, munch...aah...munch...munch.
I'm in heaven when I'm eating.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wooden benches are nice. It makes you
feel so comfortable. There's nothing
like it.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A yellow bench, eh. That's nice. I like
yellow. It's such a nice color.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a large wooden box. Is there an
elephant inside?
<PAGE>
Oh, I'm just joking.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A red pot, eh. Maybe this was dug up
from somewhere.
<PAGE>
What? You made this, <MYNAME>? Well, now
this is something.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nice table. I'd like one like
this in the inn. It must have cost
quite a bit.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If we had a private beach, beach chairs
would be perfect, but... Oh well,
there's no beach.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If we had a private beach, beach
umbrellas would be perfect, but... Oh
well, there's no beach.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Street lamps are nice. They brighten up
the town and attract people.
<PAGE>
There'll be more guests at the inn. And
everything would be just fine.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This wooden pillar smells so good. I
love the smell of wood.
<PAGE>
But if you sniff wood too much, people
look at you strange, so you have to
remember to not overdo it.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This statue was created by gathering
solar energy? Sounds like this can be
profitable.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I know, we'll advertise this as a spot
of mystic powers. It's sure to be a hit.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a water fountain. It's a bit
small to be a landmark, but still very
soothing.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A fire extinguisher is a must. It would
be terrible if a fire breaks out.
<PAGE>
Now, the best thing is to prevent fires,
in the first place.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, what are we to do with such a big
anchor?
<PAGE>
Can this be a town symbol? Or, you could
sell this clump of metal by weight and
make some money.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area has a nice feel to it. It's
neat and well-balanced. It creates a
nice path for taking a stroll.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area has a really nice feel to it.
The stone pavements look great and it's
perfect for a stroll.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area has a great feel to it. No
expense has been spared in the
surroundings. It's perfect for a date.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look, a little park. It's a perfect
place to stop for a rest.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a fine park. It's a perfect place
to stop for a rest when you're taking
a walk.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a grand park. It'll be the
town's place of relaxation. We're all
very happy.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a compact, little garden. The
flowers are beautiful.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Such a lush, green garden. Makes you
want to sit on a bench and relax.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a beautiful garden. No expense has
been spared.
<PAGE>
You should charge admission. You'd make
a lot of money.
<PAGE>
Huh? No one will come? I see, you're 
pretty shrewd.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a fine potted plant. Bamboo
brings good luck, so I'd like to have
some in my inn too.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A palm tree in the garden of my inn
would give it a tropical feel. It could
be the inn's landmark.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A flower basket has got to be yellow.
It's my favorite color.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a finely sculpted potted plant. It
must be very difficult to get it into
a circular shape.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My my, a bamboo grove. You must dig up
the bamboo shoots when they're in
season.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A nicely shaped pine tree is great for a
garden. Did you prune it, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
That's quite impressive. You should
become a professional gardener.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please plant lots of cherry trees. We'll
have flower-viewing party. 
<PAGE>
We'll have guests from other towns. 
<PAGE>
Our inn will be filled and it will be
glorious.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The changing colors of gingko trees are
so beautiful. The autumn leaves are
simply breathtaking.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A palm tree in the garden of my inn
would give it a tropical feel. It could
be the inn's landmark.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A lattice...Now that's fancy. Maybe that
will work to conceal the outside world
from within the garden.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've got flowers growing out of a
boot. That's pretty fancy stuff. <MYNAME>,
you're pretty clever.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
An arch of red flowers. Now that's nice.
Put a couple there and you've got the
start of a novel.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A gazebo's the perfect place to take a
break during a stroll.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think it would be nice to have some
vines growing around the arbor.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The chained pole makes you wonder if a
famous person or VIP is coming our way.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A wooden wall is very calming. I'd like
to put one around the inn, but that
seems like a lot of hard work.
Let's hold off on the presents for now.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I go to the hair salon once in a while.
I deal with customers, so I'm careful
about my appearance.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I go to the clothes shop to check out
uniforms for the inn. But I haven't been
able to find something I like.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Going to a restaurant and eating all you
like is what I consider true happiness.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a travel agency, so I'd like to
make arrangements to go away and find
material for my novel.
<PAGE>
But I can't close the inn. I just have
to be patient until my son gets older.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You go to a tea salon for a short break,
but when you see all that good food, you
end up staying much longer.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Running an inn means I won't be moving
any time soon. Well, I'll just taking it
easy here for awhile.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a good thing for the town to grow.
More people means more guests...I don't
relish getting busy though.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area has got a lot of western style
buildings, so my inn is a perfect match.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The eastern look around town is pretty
nice. It's peaceful and looks refined.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has a tropical motif. It's got
lots of neat things that authors could
use in a novel.
